hopobject.body:
How do you hand BeagleBone Black to your kids?

Here you go...

There are so many different situations, but it is understandable to want a bit of guidance in handing your kids a cool piece of tech from which they can learn about how electronics and computers work.

What you should expect

Things to let your kids know

Things to setup for your kids

Things to suggest your kids try

How to make sure your kids are engaged
